Template¶

class src.template.Template(name, residues)[source]¶
class Template¶

This class groups informations about a template sequence/structure.

name¶

Name of the template

Type:str
residues¶

Template’s sequence of residues as list of Residues objects

Type:list of Residue object
pdb¶

PDB filename of the template

Type:str
parse_pdb()[source]¶

Parse the pdb file and set the CA coordinates.

set_benchmark(fold_type)[source]¶

Sets the benchmark attribute of the template. The benchmark attribute represents the fold family type of the template: “Family”, “Superfamily” or “Fold”, that is to say how similar the template is from the query. This is necessary to be able to benchmark the new scoring functions.

Parameters:fold_type (str) – “Family”, “Superfamily” or “Fold”
set_pdb_name(metafold_dict)[source]¶

Get the PDB file name of the current template from the template’s name.

Parameters:metafold_dict – A dictionary with key = template name and value = pdb file
